page.title: 18Churches in weston
page.content: Weston Church was built in 1838 AD and is a Church of England.It is an average size Church and is just big enough to fit the population of Weston Village in.The Miniser of the church is Reverend David Parker and he is at the Vicarage down Cemertary Road.The times of the Services are as follows 1st sunday of the month -8.00am Holly Communion 2nd 3rd 4th 5th sunday- 10.45am Parish Communion Every week on Sunday-6.30pm Even song 1st Wednesday of the month-7.30pm Holly Communion Chapels of weston ____________________ The Chapel of Weston was built in 1831 AD and is a bit smaller than the Church.There is a side at the top saying WESLY PLACE WESTON MEDHOPIST CHAPEL.The chapel fell down one night in 1981 and was rebuilt 2 months later .
